CAMPAIGN_NAME: Environmental impact of acid-forming alum shale waste rock legacy site in Norway - Taraldrud site
CAMPAIGN_COMMENT: Study of environmental contamination from alum shale waste rock at Taraldrud legacy site in Norway. Samples collected on three occasions: autumn 2020, summer 2021, and summer 2022. Site includes precipitation pond and liming treatments to address environmental pollution but remains non-remediated.
